implicit none

end if

write(*,*) answer

deallocate(bannedR, bannedC)

end program

program codeforces_333_B
  implicit none
  integer :: n, m, i, r, c
  logical, allocatable :: bannedR(:), bannedC(:)
  integer :: count_r, count_c, answer, mid

  read(*,*) n, m

  allocate(bannedR(n))
  allocate(bannedC(n))

  bannedR = .false.
  bannedC = .false.

  do i = 1, m
    read(*,*) r, c
    if (r >= 2 .and. r <= n-1) then
      bannedR(r) = .true.
    end if
    if (c >= 2 .and. c <= n-1) then
      bannedC(c) = .true.
    end if
  end do

  count_r = count(bannedR(2 : n-1))
  count_c = count(bannedC(2 : n-1))

  answer = (n - 2) * 2 - count_r - count_c

  if (mod(n,2) == 1) then
    mid = (n + 1) / 2
    if (.not. bannedR(mid) .and. .not. bannedC(mid)) then
      answer = answer - 1
    end if
  end if

  write(*,*) answer

  deallocate(bannedR, bannedC)
end program
